member.name: T:com.paypal.sdk.core.Config
member.summary: Contains application-wide configuration settings. Singleton class accessed through Config.Instance. Configuration settings are read from the web.config/Console.exe.config file

member.name: F:com.paypal.sdk.core.Config.PAYPAL_TAG
member.summary: tag defining paypal config section in web.config/console.exe.config

member.name: F:com.paypal.sdk.core.Config.TrustAll
member.summary: TrustAll flag. If true, all certificates are validated.

member.name: F:com.paypal.sdk.core.Config.MaximumRetries
member.summary: MaximumRetries setting. Number of times SOAP requests are retried.

member.name: P:com.paypal.sdk.core.Config.ApplicationBase
member.summary: ApplicationBase defines directory where web.config is stored. If you are calling the SDK from COM, you need to set this property.

member.name: P:com.paypal.sdk.core.Config.Instance
member.summary: Use this property to access the Config singleton.

member.name: T:com.paypal.sdk.core.ConfigSectionHandler
member.summary: Used to load custom paypal config section in web.config/console.exe.config

member.name: T:com.paypal.sdk.core.ConfigSectionParser
member.summary: Parse settings defined in the paypal XML config section. The results are in the public readonly fields.

member.name: F:com.paypal.sdk.core.ConfigSectionParser.IsTrustAllSpecified
member.summary: True if the trustAll tag was defined.

member.name: F:com.paypal.sdk.core.ConfigSectionParser.TrustAll
member.summary: The boolean value parsed from the TrustAll tag. Only read this tag if IsTrustAllSpecified is true

member.name: F:com.paypal.sdk.core.ConfigSectionParser.IsMaximumRetriesSpecified
member.summary: True if the maximumRetries tag was defined.

member.name: F:com.paypal.sdk.core.ConfigSectionParser.MaximumRetries
member.summary: The boolean value parsed from the TrustAll tag. Only read this tag if IsTrustAllSpecified is true

member.summary: Check a set of objects are non-null
member.param: list of objects to check
member.returns: true if all objects in args are non-null

member.summary: Performs custom actions with web service calls such as logging

member.name: M:com.paypal.sdk.logging.DefaultSOAPHandler.GetInitializer(System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo,System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtensionAttribute)
member.summary: When the SOAP extension is accessed for the first time, the XML Web service method it is applied to is accessed to store the file name passed in, using the corresponding SoapExtensionAttribute.
member.param: A LogicalMethodInfo representing the specific function prototype for the XML Web service method to which the SOAP extension is applied.
The SoapExtensionAttribute applied to the XML Web service method.

member.param: The type of the class implementing the XML Web service to which the SOAP extension is applied.

member.param: The Object returned from GetInitializer

member.name: M:com.paypal.sdk.logging.DefaultSOAPHandler.ChainStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: ChainStream ensures that SOAP extensions with the highest priority can modify the actual data closest to the SOAP message sent or returned over the wire.
member.param: A memory buffer containing the SOAP request or response.
member.returns: A Stream representing a new memory buffer that this SOAP extension can modify.

member.name: M:com.paypal.sdk.logging.DefaultSOAPHandler.ProcessMessage(System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage)
member.summary: If the SoapMessageStage is such that the SoapRequest or SoapResponse is still in the SOAP format to be sent or received, save it to the log file.
member.param: The SoapMessage to process

member.name: M:com.paypal.sdk.logging.DefaultSOAPHandler.LogSoapEnvelope
member.summary: Log the SOAP envelope into the log file if IsDebugEnable is true

member.summary: Log the output SOAP envelope if IsDebugEnable is true

member.name: M:com.paypal.sdk.logging.DefaultSOAPHandler.WriteInput(System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage)
member.summary: Log the input SOAP envelope if IsDebugEnable is true

member.summary: Write from one Stream to another
member.param: Original Stream
Copy to Stream
